Help:Node.title: Houses
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: Houses of Calabria
The Houses of Calabria are the ruling parties for Ironclaw Online. Each brings its own specialty to the world. Check the links to the individual Houses to learn more. Basically, the Rinaldi rule in Triskellian and the other Houses are vying for power. This is politics and the world market. You can find more information at http://www.skotos.net/games/ironclaw/Houses.php or through roleplaying.
